text: Alberto Breccia (3 July 1946 - 1 December 2014) was a Uruguayan politician and lawyer. He served in the Chamber of Deputies of Uruguay representing the Broad Front party.Falleci√≥ Alberto Breccia. Breccia was born in Montevideo, Uruguay. Breccia died in Montevideo, Uruguay, aged 68. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan lawyers
